sentence: If you are a  young woman who gets pregnant and is getting your education, this bill  strengthens Title IX protections to make sure that your school clearly  informs you of your rights and ensures accountability if those rights  are violated.
title: Providing for Consideration of H.R. Supporting Pregnant and Parenting Women and Families Act; Providing for Consideration of H.R. Pregnant Students' Rights Act; and Providing for Consideration of H.J. Res.
